membership.title: Membership
membership.signInRequired: Please sign in to start membership
membership.pleaseLogInToView: Please log in to view memberships
membership.foundingMembersSubtitle: Why pay for a membership before you see the venue? Here's what makes it worth it:
membership.lowestPriceDesc: Get the lowest price we'll ever sell memberships for
membership.earlyAccessDesc: Play for free on weekends before we open (temporary courts, retas & test leagues)
membership.softLaunchDesc: Get exclusive access to our soft launch before the grand opening
membership.foundersMerchDesc: Get exclusive founder's merchandise we'll never print again
membership.creditDesc: Get $250 MXN in credit towards the bar + pro shop
membership.dayGuaranteeDesc: Full refund available in the first 7 days after we open if you're not satisfied
membership.faqSubtitle: Got questions? We've got answers to help you make the best choice.
membership.faqBillingAnswer: Memberships are billed monthly on the same date you signed up. You can update your payment method or cancel anytime in your account settings.
membership.faqEarlyBirdAnswer: New members get 50% off their first month when they sign up during our Early Bird promotion period. This offer is limited time and subject to availability.
membership.faqSwitchPlansQuestion: Can I switch between membership plans?
membership.faqSwitchPlansAnswer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your membership at any time. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle, and we'll prorate any differences.
membership.faqRefundAnswer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your membership in the first 30 days, we'll provide a full refund.
membership.faqFeesAnswer: No hidden fees! Your membership includes everything listed in your plan. The only additional costs would be optional add-ons you choose.
membership.faqLocationsQuestion: Can I use my membership at different locations?
membership.faqLocationsAnswer: Yes! Your membership gives you access to all our locations. You can book courts and attend events at any of our facilities.
membership.faqSatisfactionAnswer: We're confident you'll love your membership! If you're not completely satisfied, contact us within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.
